name: Please Help Me! I'm Stuck In Esoteric Prime Number Hell!
name_original: Please Help Me! I'm Stuck In Esoteric Prime Number Hell!
description:
Randomly Generated Levels set to a 21edo Microtonal Soundtrack!

EMBARK ON YOU JOURNEY TO ESCAPE ESOTERIC PRIME NUMBER HELL WITH THE HELP OF THE BASTARD! FIND TRUE FRIEND SHIPS AND MANY OTHERS TO HAVE;

[CONTROLS]

arrows, Z and escape
